Articles.Content: can somebody please give me a walkable Iva mod. it would be very helpful and i think it would make the game much better, if you do know of such mod please make sure its for ksp 0.90 ,,,, I REALLY WANT THAT MOD!!!

Welcome aboard! As far as I know, there are no mods that allow for such depth in IVA, but I do heartily agree, it would make the game much better. However, many people, myself included, are in agreement that the coding for such a mod or official feature would be fairly difficult if not impossible. I'm sorry, but I don't think it's going to happen.

Fly safe!
